member.name: T:DaanRuiter.Util.CMD

member.summary: Initializes the Console, must be called to be able to use it
member.param: The gameobject the initialized console component is added to

member.name: M:DaanRuiter.Util.CMD.Disable
member.summary: Disable the console, use this to block end-users from using the console When disabled, Init will do nothing

member.name: M:DaanRuiter.Util.CMD.Enable
member.summary: Enable the console

member.name: M:DaanRuiter.Util.CMD.RefreshCommands(System.Reflection.Assembly[])
member.summary: Searches for commands in the projects Assembly. Is automaticly called on Init() if RefreshCommands() was has not been called yet
member.param: assemblies to search in. Defaults to the assembly of the CMD class

member.summary: Logs an exception to the console. Stacktrace is automaticly added

the alpha values to use for the gradient
